Sikkhā Sutta：1．Sikkhā Sutta．The three forms of training in the higher insight．A．i．235．

2．Sikkhā Sutta． One must train oneself in the Dhamma．S．ii．131．

3．Sikkhā Sutta． A monk who returns to the lower life must blame himself for five things：having no faith in right things，no conscientiousness，no fear of blame，no energy，no insight into right things．A．iii．4．
